about-text:
Majes.tk is the perfect place for you and your favourite restaurant.
Order food, reserve a table or check out the menu of your favourite restaurants.
Majes.tk uses a customized version of SimpleOrder, which has an Apache OpenSource license. For further information please visit the GitHub project site.
